document_data.mainbody:
larra Idlewist was a Harper agent who, for a time, operated out of The Lonesome Tankard Inn and Tavern in the town of Eveningstar in the 15 century DR.
Olarra was a human woman with dusky skin, white eyes, and white hair. She wore her Harper pin and carried a lute.
In the 15 century DR, Olarra Idlewist posed as a minstrel patron of the Lonesome Tankard in Eveningster, offering Harpers aide to the off-world adventurers who set out to investigate the nearby ruins of the Haunted Halls.
